name: Feenix Safety & Crisis Management
description: Feenix helps people and organisations to respect the value of life and promote safety ownership. This is backed by a rich experience of over three decades in the field in safety culture, disaster management , crisis management and business continuity .
Headline: We win over hearts & minds of people ,by fun, engagement to strengthen culture in safety, crisis management & BCM
ShortDescription: A company which uses motivation and unconventional means to make people to respect the value of life. Focus on the most difficult part - the human hearts and minds in safety

Highlights.name: Improving Safety Culture Through People Engagement
Highlights.description: Feenix Consultants focuses on improving safety culture by going beyond just compliance and instead emphasizing people and engagement [1]. This means they aim to create a work environment where safety is a priority for everyone, not just a box to check.

Highlights.name: xPositive Safety Culture with Fun and Games
Highlights.description: Feenix Consultants uses a variety of methods to create a more positive safety culture, and one way they do this is by incorporating fun and games [1]. This can help to make safety training more engaging and memorable for employees.

Highlights.name: Safety Consulting for Organizations
Highlights.description: Feenix Consultants offers safety consulting services to organizations of all sizes [1]. They can help businesses to develop and implement safety programs, conduct safety audits, and provide training to employees.

enhanced_description: Feenix Safety & Crisis Management is a consultancy service with over three decades of experience in the fields of safety culture, disaster management, crisis management, and business continuity. It adopts a unique people-centric approach, aiming to foster safety ownership and strengthen organizational safety culture by winning over the hearts and minds of employees through motivation, engagement, and unconventional methods, including fun and games. This service extends beyond mere compliance, offering comprehensive safety consulting to organizations of all sizes, which includes developing and implementing tailored safety programs, conducting thorough safety audits, and providing engaging safety training to employees.
